        Parameters:

      • sendDisconnect

        public void sendDisconnect()
        Sends a message to disconnect the robot from the GUI and close the open streams.

      • sendGoto

        public void sendGoto(float x,
            float y)
        Sends the GOTO message to the robot. Sends an x and a y to the robot to indicate what point it should travel to.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate to travel to
        y - the y coordinate to travel to

      • sendStop

        public void sendStop()
        Sends the STOP message from the GUI to the NXT

      • sendSetPose

        public void sendSetPose(float x,
               float y,
               float heading)
        Sends the SET_POSE message to the robot.
        Parameters:
        x - - x coordinate of new pose
        y - - y coordinate of new pose
        heading - - heading of new pose

      • sendFix

        public void sendFix()
        Sends the FIX_POS message to the robot. Sends a FIX_POS to fix the pose to the NXT

      • sendEcho

        public void sendEcho(float angle)
        Sends the ECHO message to the robot. Sends a ping to the NXT.

      • sendTravel

        public void sendTravel(float dist)
        Sends the TRAVEL message to the robot. Sends a distance to travel to the NXT.
        Parameters:
        dist - - distance to travel

      • sendRotate

        public void sendRotate(float angle)
        Sends the ROTATE message to the robot. Sends an amount to rotate to the NXT.
        Parameters:
        angle - - amount to rotate

      • sendMapLeft

        public void sendMapLeft(float x,
               float y,
               float angle)
        Sends the SEND_MAP message to the robot. Sends an x and y as a travel distance to goto.
